subject: Assaults
Baseball
lead_paragraph: A grand jury in Ohio has indicted a minor league pitcher accused of throwing a ball that hit a fan in the forehead. Julio Castillo, a pitcher for the Peoria Chiefs, an affiliate of the Chicago Cubs, is accused of throwing into the stands during a July 24 game against Dayton. The game had a 10-minute, benches-clearing brawl. The fan was treated for a concussion at a hospital. Castillo was indicted on two counts of felonious assault.
